addTransition

public void addTransition(java.lang.String from,
                          java.lang.String to,
                          java.lang.String label,
                          java.lang.String guardIn,
                          java.lang.String actionIn)
Adds transition to the extended finite automaton

Parameters:
from - name of the source state
to - name of the destination state
label - semi-colon separated list of event names for the transition
guardIn - guard expression for the transition
actionIn - action expression for the transition
